elements.name: Crystal
elements.description: Grants a maximum limit to amount of damage that can be taken by a signle attack or ability

elements.name: Electric
elements.description: Damage adjacent enemies whenever they critically strike or are critically struck

elements.name: Glacial
elements.description: attacks have a chance to stun their target

elements.name: Inferno
elements.description: ignite ground beneath their targets, damaging enemies in the fire

elements.name: Light
elements.description: on death, heal other light champion for a percentage of their max health and grant them attack speed for the rest of the round

elements.name: Steel
elements.description: briefly become immune to damage when they drop below 50% health

elements.name: Mountain
elements.description: grants a massive shield to a random ally at the start of combat

elements.name: Poison
elements.description: Damaging attacks and abilities to increase the mana cost of targets' abilities

elements.name: Shadow
elements.description: deal increased damage for the first few seconds of combat or takedown

elements.name: Woodland
elements.description: one of them to randomly create a clone of themselves

class.name: Alchemist
class.description: can move through other units and never stop moving

class.name: Assassin
class.description: Grants increased critical strike change and damage

class.name: Avatar
class.description: An Avatar's element is counted twice for trait bonuses

class.name: Berserker
class.description: attacks have a chance to deal damage in a cone behind the target

class.name: Blademaster
class.description: attacks have a chance to hit extra times

class.name: Summoner
class.description: Increases health and duration of their spawned allies, pets benefit from Element and Class bonuses

class.name: Mage
class.description: Grants a change after casting an bility to cast it again

class.name: Predator
class.description: Attacks and abilities immediately kill low-health enemies

class.name: Ranger
class.description: Grants a chance to gain a burst of attack speed
